title: Let’s Go Cool Off!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Hey, hey. What kind of place are we headed to right now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I heard you’re exhausted from the heat, Yoshiko, so I’m taking you to my favorite place to escape the heat.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s Yohane, not Yoshiko. A place to escape to heat...... like a vacation home?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Yes. It’s a beautiful log house.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I bet the air must be fresh there!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Yup, it’s great! Though it’s a bit thin.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Thin? What do you mean?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Oh, don’t worry about it. Okay, Yoshi-Yohane-san, we have to change after we get off the train. We’re going to rent hiking pants and shoes!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>......We’re going to a place to escape the heat, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>It’s on top of a nice and cool mountain!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
